attributes.text:
This is a widget that enhances an HTML table with some basic features like Sorting and Filtering.

EXPERIMENTAL – NOT READY FOR PRODUCTION

CSS Classes

Class Name Applied to Description
qx-table Table element Identifies the Table widget
qx-table-cell Table cell (td) Identifies and styles a cell of the widget
qx-table-header Table header (th) Identifies and styles a header of the table widget
qx-table-row-selection Table cell (td) Identifies and styles the cells containing the inputs for the row selection
qx-table-selection-input input Identifies and styles input element to select a table row
qx-table-input-label Label element (label) Identifies and styles label contained in the selection cell. This label can be used to create custom inputs
qx-table-row-selected Selected row (tr) Identifies and styles the selected table rows
qx-table-sort-asc Table header (th) Identifies and styles the header of the current ascendant sorted column
qx-table-sort-desc Table header (th) Identifies and styles the header of the current descendant sorted column
Fires each time a cell of the widget is clicked
Fires each time a cell of the widget is hovered
Fires each time the mouse leave a cell of the table widget
Fires each time the value of a cell is rendered into the cell
Fires after the table rows have been filtered
Fires after the model has been applied to the widget
Fires after the table rows have been sorted

caseSensitive Determines if the string sorting/filtering should be case sensitive or not. Default value : false.

rowSelection Defines the row selection type. Possible values are : ‘none’, ‘single’, ‘multiple’. Default value : none.

columnDefault The Default cell template for all the table columns. Default value :

  
    

      
    

  "

To define a custom template for a specific name use setTemplate(‘colname’, template) or use

setTemplate('columnDefault', template) to set one template for all your table columns.
Gets the index of an HTMLElement inside of an HTMLCollection

Factory method which converts the current collection into a collection of table widgets.
Html element representing the header or footer of the table
Adds the internal css class to the header and footer cells
Adds a class to the head or footer of the current sorted column
Applies the given model to the table cells depending on the mustache template specified before

The index of the column or -1 if the column doesn’t exists

Gets the metadata of the column width the specified name
Gets the table’s data rows from the DOM

Handles clicks that happen on the selection inputs
Renders or removes the selection inputs according to the specified widget selection mode
Checks if the selection inputs are already rendered
True if the inputs are rendered and false otherwise
The name of the column to be sorted
Sorts the table rows for the given row and direction
Sorts the rows of the table widget

The String value of the second date to compare
The String value of the first number to compare
The String value of the second number to compare
Html string or collection containing the rows to be appended
Filters rows or columns according to the given parameters
